name: Tony Magiera
text: The pizza here is always good. I've always had perfect service with no issues with my orders. With the deals, prices are pretty good, too.

name: Life Rated
text: Food was pretty good. Better than expected. Tried it on my way back to IL and am glad I saw the coupon flyer at the Quality Inn. Food was not that hot upon delivery but was still good. The brownie desert was actually great tasting and not ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Halder
text: So I‚Äôm not sure what happened but we got the same pizza but we didn‚Äôt order the same. Anyways, Ian picked up the phone and was courteous, helpful, and his attitude was seriously phenomenal. I‚Äôm not the best phone talker and I fumbled my ‚Ä¶More

name: Jodi Jean
text: Top notch service and pizza. Deep dish with bacon and onion crust, nobody does it better than Marshall H.H. üëç Highly recommend.

name: Scott Whitesell
text: In a land of cookie cutter pizza joints, our local Hungry Howies does a great job at making one feel at home.

name: shawn keasal
text: Haley is a friggin rock star!!! She saw us waiting for a tow truck to come tow my wife's vehicle and to help make her feel better she brought us a free Cinnamon Howie Bread!! Thank you so very much Haley!!!

name: J D
text: Quality isn't always consistent. Certain days is taste better than others depending on the crew that's working. Overall pretty good food and great lunch meals and prices.

name: Kirt Powers
text: Pizza and cheese bread were wonderful.  Use caution though.  I ordered the family meal deal which is one 5 topping large pizza and one 2 topping large pizza for $23.99. On top of that each topping is an additional $1.99.  It's not a 5 topping pizza and a 2 topping pizza it is 2 cheese pizzas and you pay for each topping you want.

name: Jonathon Harris
text: Love the buffalo chicken pizza. Perfect flavor and ingredients.

name: Rock Correnti
text: Ordered a BBQ Chicken Deep Dish Pizza for 20 bucks and got BBQ cheese bread! Maybe a total of 4 small pieces of chicken and they did not even drizzle the BBQ over the top of the pizza. It was just a layer of BBQ and Cheese that's it. Nicely ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaycie McGruder
text: This is actually the best Hungry Howie's I've ever ordered from! We moved to Marshall from Kalamazoo and ordered regularly from a few different locations there. We will be moving back soon, and we will definitely miss this one! Pizza always ‚Ä¶More

text: Google maps did t bring me to the door but I hope I fixed it

name: Selena
text: Between having just lost my dad and staying in a hotel I don't appropriate the delivery person telling me "most people would just go buy a bottle" Love your ranch though!

name: Suzanne Oesch
text: Love LOVE the staff here at this Hungry Howie‚Äôs! Kindest staff who remembers you, and takes care of all the details that you ask for. The pizza is always HOT and it‚Äôs always right!

text: For Gas Station pizza this place kicks Little Caesars, and Domino's but! The pizza was great, definitely get the flavored crust. The subs were out of this world. But the price was really down to Earth. ‚Ä¶More

text: Greasy. Bad advertising makes it out like special comes with drink but in reality only a drink comes with salad. Had people working in lobby unprofessional they didn‚Äôt do anything to separate the construction workers from people eating. ‚Ä¶More

text: Yummy stuff! The calzones are awesome! Fast and friendly service.

name: Brandon Newling
text: Ordered online, arrived 10 minutes later Just as ordered. Best pizza in town!!

name: katie taylor
text: Great place! Always fresh and hot

name: carlyon reed
text: Poor phone and delivery service and rude operators taking orders, late delivery and missing items. Overall poor service and rude customer service.

name: Paul Radulescu
text: Great pizza, great deals, and great staff. It's the triple threat.

name: cpddan
text: Great location next to a Tesla Supercharger with good food on the go.

name: Luke Lauterbach
text: Delivery drivers seem to always take the Tesla chargers, which is especially disappointing since this is a popular charging spot. It makes charging quickly difficult.

name: Sheldon Zimmerman
text: The subs are essentially a medium stuffed pie folded and baked in half. Some kind of good seasoning on top üëç

name: Zachary Briggs
text: I've never been much of a fan of Hungry Howie's. Every now and then I give them another try but ultimately I'm disappointed. I'm not looking for high end, but I do expect to be able to chew my food rather than grind it up like a stone.

name: Bryant Lautzenheiser
text: Great pizza, as usual.  Bbq chicken pizza seems more spicy lately--more pepper or different sauce.

name: N C
text: We stopped in to order our pizza. The manager helped since I was trying to order from my app on phone. I will order again and highly recommend.  Pizza is great taste and toppings go to the crust.

name: Zachary Smith
text: Yummy and delicious, facility looks nice, new and clean. Treated me well when I ordered lunch. I'm a picky eater when it comes to my pizza and I received no sighs or eye rolls when I provided my order.

name: Grigorios Stamatopoulos
text: Better than your typical gas station pizza. Very busy. Delivery drivers seem to be constantly in and out.

name: M Davidson
text: The salad was good. Larger than I anticipated. Wish they used better boneless wings, they're ok, just the type that's all breading. Be sure to call instead of doing online if you want to get the right order. Sent me the wrong wings, but ‚Ä¶More

text: Sadness I‚Äôve had few problems with these guys but this is the worst!!

Delivery is always super fast, even on the busiest of nights. ‚Ä¶More

name: hunter haluch
text: I love this place. Best pizza in town. Basically all I eat and it never gets old!! Great customer service and great delivery time!!! Always have great deals just ask the employees! Also Flo Rida are here so pretty much the only "official" place to eat if you want to feel famous!

name: Teresa Morgan
text: I ordered a pan pizza. Ham and onion. No ham. I paid  $19.00 +  plus dollars  for the WORST  pizza in my  life.   Small. That was supposed  to be a large  For + $19.00. I'll never  order anything  from Hungry  Howies   Ripoff big time ‚Ä¶More

text: Excellent Food as Always - Service & Speed NOT so good - I phoned my order and the staff that took my order was courteous and friendly - Yet, I had to wait about 35-40min. to  receive my order - Other than that everything was good.

text: Awesome salad & pizza! Everytime we order for delivery, we're told 50 minutes. However typically, we have it in 30 minutes or less!!
